title: Was Trump’s SAG-AFTRA Letter Signed ‘President Donald J. Trump’?
subtitle: Using the title of “President” in a signature does not appear to be out of the ordinary among former presidents.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In a Feb. 4, 2021, letter resigning from the Screen Actors Guild (SAG-AFTRA), a union for film and television performers, former U.S. President Donald Trump signed his name as “President Donald J. Trump.”
